raw_body: MAHASEN WIJESUNDERA – Loving husband of Dushyanthi Wijesundera,​ beloved father of Resuree and Baavika,​ son of late Mr & Mrs C.A. Wijesundera,​ brother of Parakrama,​ Padmini and late Indira. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect’,​ Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Bauddhaloka Mw.,​ Colombo 08 from 3 p.m. on Thursday 13th July. Cremation on the 14th July at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.043275
